title: IMMARA Model-Based Mathematical Leadership Education for Enhancing Digital Literacy and Creativity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and experience in mathematical problem-solving
context.additional_context: Team-based learning environments emphasizing real-life problem-solving scenarios through VR simulations

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to creatively solve complex mathematical problems by utilizing the five stages of the IMMARA model (Investigate-Model-Make-Apply-Reflect).
Establish problem-solving strategies while effectively communicating with team members using digital collaboration tools.
Improve the accuracy of mathematical models by at least 85% by applying data visualization and analysis techniques in a VR simulation environment.
Achieve a score improvement of at least 20% compared to the pre-assessment in digital literacy evaluation tools.

resources: VR Headset and Motion Controller Set

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
